content.prompt_es: Complete the sentences with the correct words.
content.main_text: Last summer, I (1)___ to a small village. It was a quiet place with beautiful scenery. One day, I (2)___ a big festival in the town square. People (3)___ traditional clothes and danced happily. I (4)___ my camera to take pictures of the event. At the end of the day, I (5)___ my friends about all the fun I had.
content.explanation:
(1) El verbo 'went' es el pasado de 'go', que significa viajar a un lugar.
(2) El verbo 'saw' es el pasado de 'see', que significa observar algo.
(3) El verbo 'wore' es el pasado de 'wear', que significa llevar ropa.
(4) El verbo 'took' es el pasado de 'take', que significa captar algo con una cámara.
(5) El verbo 'told' es el pasado de 'tell', que significa informar o contar algo.

content.prompt_es:
Fill in the gaps with the correct form of the word given in parentheses.

Base words: (1) DEVELOP, (2) CREATE, (3) OVERLOAD, (4) SIMPLIFY, (5) INNOVATE
content.main_text: Technology is constantly changing and has a big impact on our daily lives. The (1)___ (DEVELOP) of new software allows us to work more efficiently. With the rise of social media, people now have a new way to share their (2)___ (CREATE) and connect with others. However, this can also lead to issues like information (3)___ (OVERLOAD), where users feel overwhelmed by too much content. To address this, many companies focus on (4)___ (SIMPLIFY) their applications to enhance user experience. Additionally, the (5)___ (INNOVATE) of hardware is essential for keeping up with the latest trends in technology.
content.explanation:
(1) La palabra 'development' es un sustantivo que se forma a partir del verbo 'develop'.
(2) La palabra 'creativity' es un sustantivo que se deriva del verbo 'create'.
(3) La palabra 'overload' se usa como sustantivo y ya está en su forma correcta.
(4) La palabra 'simplification' es un sustantivo que se forma a partir del verbo 'simplify'.
(5) La palabra 'innovation' es un sustantivo que se deriva del verbo 'innovate'.
